home.intro: I am a frontend engineer focused on building high-performance and user-friendly web applications with modern frontend technology stack.

about.title: Profile
about.description: I am a frontend engineer graduated from Beijing Union University with a major in Software Engineering. As a member of the Communist Party of China, I always maintain a positive and proactive work attitude.
about.experience: With years of frontend development experience, proficient in modern frontend technology stack.

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro: Here are some major projects I have participated in, showcasing my skills and experience in frontend development.

1.title: Enterprise Management System
1.description: A modern enterprise management system based on Vue 3, including multiple subsystems and complex business logic processing.

2.title: Resource Planning System
2.description: A resource planning and visualization system developed with Vue 3 and AntV G6, supporting real-time data updates and complex graphics display.

3.title: Data Visualization Platform
3.description: A data visualization platform based on React and ECharts, supporting various chart types and data export functionality.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: If you find my projects helpful, feel free to support me
